name: Maul of the Titans
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Magic Items/Wondrous Items/Maul of the Titans

Construction.Requirements: Craft Wondrous Item, Craft Magic Arms and Armor, clenched fist

sections.body: This mallet is 8 feet long. If used as a weapon, it is the equivalent of a +3 greatclub and deals triple damage against inanimate objects. The wielder must have a Strength of at least 18 to wield it properly. Otherwise, she takes a –4 penalty on attack rolls.
sections.name: Description
